Start here

Requirements

  • NodeJS
  • a PostGreSQL server

local environment

PORT=8080
DATABASE_URL=postgresql://user:pass@database:5432/
BASE_URL=http://0.0.0.0

#

Install

git clone https://github.com/story-squad/tricktionary-be
cd tricktionary-be
npm install

#

Commands

#

npm run build
  • Clean, lint, & transpile TS -> JS.

#

npm start
  • start the app.

#
